room_title: Escape room "The Forbidden Forest" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: A number of our scouts/leaders and parents of our Boy Scout Troop participated in 2 rooms - we all escaped (thank goodness) - had a great time! The boys are still talking about their adventure. Looking forward to doing again in the future!

room_title: Escape room "The Forbidden Forest" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: I’ve been to three and I loved it! Can’t wait to do more. If you love games, puzzles, mystery; then you just gotta go! The more people with you the better! Great game that even makes strangers work together! Awesome entertainment!

room_title: Escape room "The Forbidden Forest" by Epic Escape Rooms LI in New York
review: We had a fun time trying to find the clues to complete the escape. Mike was very helpful in relating the hints. Make sure you know some jokes so you can get more hints. Great time was had by the six of us. Definitely will try another room soon.
